verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which \add was\add* the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w*.

For then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* was shut \w up|strong="H3607"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*, which \add was\add* in the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah’s|strong="H3063"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

For \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had shut him \w up|strong="H3607"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore dost thou \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it;

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall not \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, but shall \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with him \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*;

And he shall \w lead|strong="H3212"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and there shall he be until I \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* him, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: though ye \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, ye shall not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.
¶ And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Behold, \w Hanameel|strong="H2601"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* thine \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* thee my \w field|strong="H7704"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*: for the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* \add is\add* thine to \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add it\add*.

So \w Hanameel|strong="H2601"\w* mine \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to me in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* my \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, I pray thee, that \add is\add* in \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: for the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of \w inheritance|strong="H3425"\w* \add is\add* thine, and the \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* \add is\add* thine; \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add it\add* for thyself. Then I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that this \add was\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And I \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Hanameel|strong="H2601"\w* my \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that \add was\add* in \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, and \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* him the \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \add even\add* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 32.9 \ft seventeen…: or, seven shekels and ten pieces of silver\f*

And I \w subscribed|strong="H3789"\w* the \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \add it\add*, and \w took|strong="H5749"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, and \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \add him\add* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* in the \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*.\f + \fr 32.10 \ft subscribed…: Heb. wrote in the book\f*

So I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*, \add both\add* that which was \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \add according\add* to the \w law|strong="H4687"\w* and \w custom|strong="H2706"\w*, and that which was \w open|strong="H1540"\w*:

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4271"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Hanameel|strong="H2601"\w* mine \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \add son\add*, and in the \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* that \w subscribed|strong="H3789"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*, \w before|strong="H5869"\w* all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*.
¶ And I \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* these \w evidences|strong="H5612"\w*, this \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*, both which is \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w*, and this \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w* which is \w open|strong="H1540"\w*; and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in an \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, that they may \w continue|strong="H5975"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Houses|strong="H1004"\w* and \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* shall be possessed \w again|strong="H7069"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Now \w when|strong="H0310"\w* I had \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w evidence|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, I \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Ah|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! behold, thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* by thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \add and\add* there is \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* too \w hard|strong="H6381"\w* for thee:\f + \fr 32.17 \ft too…: or, hid from thee\f*

Thou \w shewest|strong="H6213"\w* \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w recompensest|strong="H7999"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* into the \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* of their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them: the \w Great|strong="H1419"\w*, the \w Mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,

\w Great|strong="H1419"\w* in \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* in \w work|strong="H5950"\w*: for thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* \w open|strong="H6491"\w* upon all the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and according to the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*:\f + \fr 32.19 \ft work: Heb. doing\f*

Which hast \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add even\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and among \add other\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*; and hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*;

And hast brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, and with \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, and with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H0248"\w*, and with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w terror|strong="H4172"\w*;

And hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which thou didst \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*;

And they came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* it; but they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, neither \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* nothing of all that thou \w commandedst|strong="H6680"\w* them to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: therefore thou hast caused all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* to \w come|strong="H7122"\w* upon them:

Behold the \w mounts|strong="H5550"\w*, they are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it; and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, that \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against it, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and of the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and of the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*: and what thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* is come to pass; and, behold, thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 32.24 \ft mounts: or, engines of shot\f*

And thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* thee the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w take|strong="H5749"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*; for the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.\f + \fr 32.25 \ft for the: or, though the\f*
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Behold, I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: is there any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* too \w hard|strong="H6381"\w* for me?

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it:

And the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, that \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w set|strong="H3341"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* on this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, upon whose \w roofs|strong="H1406"\w* they have offered \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and poured \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* have only \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* me from their \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*: for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have only provoked me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* hath been to me \add as\add* a provocation of mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and of my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* it even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; that I should \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* it from before my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*,\f + \fr 32.31 \ft a provocation…: Heb. for my anger\f*

Because of all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, they, their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, their \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and their \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And they have \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* unto me the \w back|strong="H6203"\w*, and not the \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: though I \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* them, rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w teaching|strong="H3925"\w* \add them\add*, yet they have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.\f + \fr 32.33 \ft back: Heb. neck\f*

But they \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* it.

And they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, which \add are\add* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, to cause their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through \add the fire\add* unto \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*; which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them not, neither \w came|strong="H5927"\w* it into my \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, that they should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*, to cause \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

¶ And now therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, concerning this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, whereof ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, It shall be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*;

Behold, I will gather them \w out|strong="H6908"\w* of all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and in \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*; and I will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and I will cause them to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*:
And they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that they may \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* me for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*, for the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* of them, and of their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them:\f + \fr 32.39 \ft for ever: Heb. all days\f*

And I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, that I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w them|strong="H0310"\w*, to do them \w good|strong="H3190"\w*; but I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* in their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*, that they shall not \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from me.\f + \fr 32.40 \ft from them: Heb. from after them\f*

Yea, I will \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* over them to do them \w good|strong="H2895"\w*, and I will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w assuredly|strong="H0571"\w* with my whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and with my whole \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 32.41 \ft assuredly: Heb. in truth, or, stability\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Like as I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* all this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, so will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon them all the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that I have \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* them.

And \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* shall be \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whereof ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* without \w man|strong="H0120"\w* or \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; it is \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

Men shall \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w subscribe|strong="H3789"\w* \w evidences|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \add them\add*, and \w take|strong="H5749"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and in the places \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*: for I will cause their \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
